== Chemancheri (CT) (627399) ==

Chemancheri (CT) is a town in the [[Quilandy]] taluka of [[Kozhikode]] district with an area of 16.76 sq. km. and harbouring 8090 households with total population of 34819 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kozhikode]] is at a distance of 17 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 432 km. Male population is 16112 and female population is 18707. Scheduled Caste population is 1810 and Scheduled Tribes population is 36. Census Location Code of the town is 627399<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 17 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 17 km. Railway station is at Chemancheri at a distance of 5 km.
